subdisciplines.name: Modernist Poetry
subdisciplines.description: The study of poetry produced during the modernist period, characterized by unique language and forms.

subdisciplines.name: Modernist Fiction
subdisciplines.description: The study of fiction produced during the modernist period, characterized by a focus on inner consciousness and fragmented narrative forms.

subdisciplines.name: Modernist Drama
subdisciplines.description: The study of drama produced during the modernist period, characterized by experimental techniques and themes that challenged traditional social norms.
